code: var _require=require("../../config"),API=_require.API;export var getAllProducts=function getAllProducts(){return fetch("".concat(API,"/getallproducts")).then(function(res){return res.json();}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};export var addProduct=function addProduct(product,token){return fetch("".concat(API,"/addproduct"),{method:"POST",headers:{authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)},body:product}).then(function(res){return res.json();}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};export var productDetails=function productDetails(id){return fetch("".concat(API,"/getproductdetails/").concat(id)).then(function(res){return res.json();}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};export var updateProduct=function updateProduct(id,product,token){return fetch("".concat(API,"/updateproduct/").concat(id),{method:"PUT",headers:{authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)},body:product}).then(function(res){return res.json();}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};export var getFilteredProducts=function getFilteredProducts(filter){return fetch("".concat(API,"/getfilteredproducts"),{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({filter:filter})}).then(function(res){return res.json();}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};export var getRelatedProducts=function getRelatedProducts(id){return fetch("".concat(API,"/getrelatedproducts/").concat(id)).then(function(res){return res.json();}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};
